nz.govt.natlib.adapter.wav

Class WaveAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.govt.natlib.adapter.DataAdapter
      • nz.govt.natlib.adapter.wav.WaveAdapter

  • public class WaveAdapter
extends DataAdapter
    WaveAdapter is responsible for extracting metadata out of Audio Wave files.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nic Evans

    • Method Detail

      • acceptsFile

        public boolean acceptsFile(java.io.File file)
        Description copied from class: DataAdapter
        This method tests whether this is adapter wants to attempt to extract metadata from this file. The standard adapters test for a file extension match, and then make additional tests to increase the confidence of getting the right type. These extra tests may involve checking header bytes or looking for particular sequences of characters in the file. This method may make use of the checkFileHeader(File,String) helper method.
        Specified by:
        acceptsFile in class DataAdapter
        Parameters:
        file - The file to test.
        Returns:
        True if this adapter will attempt to extract the metadata from the file.

      • getOutputType

        public java.lang.String getOutputType()
        Description copied from class: DataAdapter
        Return the DTD of the native metadata file this DataAdapter produces. Subclasses should hard-code this method to return the name of that DTD.
        Specified by:
        getOutputType in class DataAdapter
        Returns:
        The filename of the DTD.

      • getInputType

        public java.lang.String getInputType()
        Description copied from class: DataAdapter
        Return the MimeType of the type of file this adapter "adapts". For standard adapters this should return the MIME type of the input file. Subclasses will, in general, hard-code this value.
        Specified by:
        getInputType in class DataAdapter
        Returns:
        the MIME Type.
